name: docbox-astro
title: Docbox Astro
desc: A highly customizable modern documentation theme built with Astro and Tailwind CSS.
article:
Docbox Astro theme is perfect for creating user guides, developer documentation, or technical manuals. Docbox makes it easy to craft clear, concise, and visually appealing documentation that your users will love.

Key Features

  • Google PageSpeed Score 100! (Desktop)
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • Search
  • Contact form support
  • Taxonomy support
  • Write and update content in Markdown / MDX
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • No jQuery. Only Vanilla JavaScript
  • Clean folder structure
  • Simple and easy development environment setup
  • Free Google fonts
  • Font Awesome icons
  • Lifetime free updates
  • Detail documentation
